get.description: This interface supports the downloading of Broker rebate orders.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End time, for example: 20241010 (query data with a maximum interval of 6 months)

url.description: Rebate order file (link is valid for 1 day)

get.x-sdk-method-description: This interface supports the downloading of Broker rebate orders.

get.description: This endpoint supports querying the basic information of the current Broker.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End time, for example: 20230210 (query data with a maximum interval of 6 months)

maxAccountSize.description: The maximum number of sub-accounts allowed to be created; null means no limit

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint supports querying the basic information of the current Broker.

post.description: This endpoint supports Broker users creating sub-accounts.
post.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint supports Broker users creating sub-accounts.

accountName.description: Sub-account Name. Note that this name is unique across the exchange. It is recommended to add a special identifier to prevent name duplication.

get.description: This interface supports querying sub-accounts created by Broker.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number returned per page, the default is 20, the maximum is 100

get.x-sdk-method-description: This interface supports querying sub-accounts created by Broker.

post.description: This interface supports the creation of Broker sub-account APIKEY.
post.x-sdk-method-description: This interface supports the creation of Broker sub-account APIKEY.

ipWhitelist.description: IP whitelist list, supports up to 20 IPs

permissions.description: Permission group list (only General, Spot and Futures permissions can be set, such as "General, Trade").

get.description: This interface supports querying the Broker’s sub-account APIKEY.
get.x-sdk-method-description: This interface supports querying the Broker’s sub-account APIKEY.

delete.description: This interface supports deleting Broker’s sub-account APIKEY.
delete.x-sdk-method-description: This interface supports deleting Broker’s sub-account APIKEY.

post.description: This interface supports modifying the Broker’s sub-account APIKEY.
post.x-sdk-method-description: This interface supports modifying the Broker’s sub-account APIKEY.

ipWhitelist.description: IP whitelist list, supports up to 20 IPs

permissions.description: [Permissions](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/doc-338144) group list (only General, Spot and Futures permissions can be set, such as "General, Trade").

post.description: This endpoint supports fund transfer between Broker accounts and Broker sub-accounts.  Please be aware that withdrawal from sub-accounts is not directly supported. Broker has to transfer funds from broker sub-account to broker account to initiate the withdrawals.
post.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint supports fund transfer between Broker accounts and Broker sub-accounts.  Please be aware that withdrawal from sub-accounts is not directly supported. Broker has to transfer funds from broker sub-account to broker account to initiate the withdrawals.

amount.description: Transfer Amount (must be a positive integer in the currency's precision)

direction.description: Fund transfer direction: OUT (Broker account is transferred to Broker sub-account), IN (Broker sub-account is transferred to Broker account)

accountType.description: Broker account types: MAIN (Funding account), TRADE (Spot trading account)

specialUid.description: Broker sub-account UID, must be the Broker sub-account created by the current Broker user.

specialAccountType.description: Broker sub-account types: MAIN (Funding account), TRADE (Spot trading account)

clientOid.description: Client Order ID, the unique identifier created by the client. It is recommended to use UUID. The maximum length is 128 bits.

get.description: This endpoint supports querying the transfer records of the broker itself and its created sub-accounts.

fromUid.description: UID of the user transferring out

fromAccountType.description: From Account Type: Account Type: MAIN, TRADE, CONTRACT, MARGIN, ISOLATED

fromAccountTag.description: Trading pair (required if the account type is ISOLATED), e.g., BTC-USDT

toUid.description: UID of the user transferring in

toAccountType.description: Account Type: Account Type: MAIN, TRADE, CONTRACT, MARGIN, ISOLATED

toAccountTag.description: To Trading pair (required if the account type is ISOLATED), e.g., BTC-USDT

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint supports querying the transfer records of the broker itself and its created sub-accounts.

get.description: The deposit records of each sub-account under the ND broker can be obtained at this endpoint.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status. Available value: PROCESSING, SUCCESS, FAILURE

parameters.name: endTimestamp
parameters.description: End time (milliseconds); default sorting in descending order

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of returned items, maximum 1000, default 1000

memo.description: Address remark. If there’s no remark, it is empty. When you withdraw from other platforms to KuCoin, you need to fill in memo(tag). Be careful: If you do not fill in memo(tag), your deposit may not be available.

status.description: Status. Available value: PROCESSING, SUCCESS, FAILURE

updatedAt.description: Update time of the database record

get.x-sdk-method-description: The deposit records of each sub-account under the ND broker can be obtained at this endpoint.

get.description: This endpoint supports querying the deposit record of sub-accounts created by a Broker (excluding main account of ND broker).
get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint supports querying the deposit record of sub-accounts created by a Broker (excluding main account of ND broker).

get.description: This endpoint supports querying the withdrawal records of sub-accounts created by a Broker (excluding main account of ND broker).
get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint supports querying the withdrawal records of sub-accounts created by a Broker (excluding main account of ND broker).

get.description: This interface supports the downloading of Broker rebate orders.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End time, for example: 20241010 (query data with a maximum interval of 6 months)

url.description: Rebate order file (link is valid for 1 day)

get.x-sdk-method-description: This interface supports the downloading of Broker rebate orders.
